metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37302 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in SiteLinksView.php in Wikibase in MediaWikithrough 1.39.3. There is XSS via a crafted badge title attribute. This isalso related to lack of escaping in wbTemplate (fromresources/wikibase/templates.js) for quotes (which can be in a titleattribute).

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
